channel.title: Development of Computer Science
channel.description:
I need some more ideas for my presentation. I have already cut out stuff from this list that was irrelevant to my presentation and the subject itself. I posted this on MITB and got some responses but I think it's still not enough information to be completely "educated".
Presentation needs to be 10 minutes. The amount of information I have right now is about 7-8.
[pre][b]Companies[/b] Xerox Alto MazeWar Date of completion Specs IBM DOS Digital Research relations (CP/M) m$ Decline and split from m$ Apple Graphical User Interface (GUI) Xerox programmers help develop GUI Steve Jobs Microsoft MS-DOS Bill Gates
[b]Operating Systems[/b] Windows Versions and differences MacOS Versions and differences Linux Versions and differences
[b]Computer parts[/b] Processor RAM Microchip Etc
[b]Internet[/b] Development Website King (lol) -Need more idea Programming PHP HTML CSS
[b]Programming languages[/b] JAVA C/C#/C+/C++ Ruby Simba [/pre]

item.title: Development of Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Discussed what I had minus programming and web languages and it took 16 minutes to present.

Read full topic

item.description:

How is that not 10 minutes 0_o

You could discuss solaris as well

item.title: Development of Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

Dude… You could also add information about quantum computers! The strongest one so far can only solve 3 x 5.

Read full topic

item.title: Development of Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Or how RAM developed. Used to be DRAM at one point. And I believe there was static DRAM. Forgive me if my memory has failed me.

Read full topic

item.description:
